Trump: s claim of "serious voter fraud" in California was made without providing any evidence to support it.
The Pew Research Center study cited by T: s spokesman does not provide any evidence of "serious voter fraud" specifically in California.
State and local election officials: along with independent observers, have reported no widespread instances of voter fraud in California.
